title: Blessings and GM to all. Welcome to new month, the Lord has made. Never get tired of doing good. Never...

attachments.displayName: Blessings and GM to all. Welcome to new month, the Lord has made. Never get tired of doing good. Never compare yourself to others. Never think that God has forgotten you. Don’t get frustrated because others are being blessed and you are waiting on the Lord for yours.  God knows the appointed time and place where he will bless you. This is still the year of Double Honor. It a new month and God still wants to bless you. What he has done for one he will do for you. Don’t stop trusting in him. Be blessed.

object.content: Blessings and GM to all. Welcome to new month, the Lord has made. Never get tired of doing good. Never compare yourself to others. Never think that God has forgotten you. Don’t get frustrated because others are being blessed and you are waiting on the Lord for yours.  God knows the appointed time and place where he will bless you. This is still the year of Double Honor. It a new month and God still wants to bless you. What he has done for one he will do for you. Don’t stop trusting in him. Be blessed.

access.description: Be Empowered (Changes are possible if you believe.)
